Aviation

Flying is a huge passion of mine. I will stand next to a runway for hours and watch airplanes without a care in the world. I fly dinky airplanes when my wallet permits.

  • View Toronto Flying Photos
  • View Vancouver Flying Photos
  • Toronto Flying

    After years of passenger flights out of Buttonville (CYKZ), I trained and got my license at Toronto Island Airport (CYTZ) in 2012.

    My favourite Toronto flights are those that are out over cottage country.

  • Vancouver Flying

    When I moved to Vancouver one of the first things I did was to get up flying. I fly out of Boundary Bay Airport (CZBB).

    My favourite spots to take passengers are Widgeon Lake and Qualicum Beach (CAT4). There are many other places Iâ€™m hoping to check out soon!
